https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Server_queries#Source_Server

UDP Header: 4x16bit
Hier: 3x16bit (wohl keine Prüfsumme)

A2S_INFO:
Hex: FF FF FF FF 54 53 6F 75 72 63 65 20 45 6E 67 69 6E 65 20 51 75 65 72 79 00
ASCII: ÿÿÿÿTSource Engine Query

Antwort:

meins:   
45|03 <-Version4,IHL (5*32bit)| ToS (Type of Service)
0035 <-Lenght:35bytes
6A77 <- IPID
0|000 <- Flags|Offset
72|11 <- TTL|Embedded Protocoll (UDP)
2AF3 <- Checksum
5477 <- source address (84.119.153.87 -> unitymedia)
9957 <- source address
89E2 <- dest address (137.226.59.154)!!!
3B9A <- dest address
F117 <- src port
6987 <- dest port
0021 <- length
3308 <- checksum
